author: Ramin Bozorgzadeh
abstract: Comprehensive error prevention and best practices enforcement for AI agent-assisted coding. Contains 10+ core principles covering input validation, error handling, null safety, async operations, type safety, and defensive programming. Includes latest 2026 tooling guides (Biome migration, AI code review checklist) and 60KB+ of reference documentation with real-world examples, TypeScript patterns, and testing strategies.
